simplesect.title: NAME
simplesect.simpara: git-count-objects - Count unpacked number of objects and their disk consumption

simplesect.title: DESCRIPTION
simplesect.simpara: This counts the number of unpacked object files and disk space consumed by them, to help you decide when it is a good time to repack.

listitem.simpara: count: the number of loose objects
size: disk space consumed by loose objects, in KiB (unless -H is specified)
in-pack: the number of in-pack objects
size-pack: disk space consumed by the packs, in KiB (unless -H is specified)
prune-packable: the number of loose objects that are also present in the packs. These objects could be pruned using git prune-packed.
garbage: the number of files in object database that are neither valid loose objects nor valid packs
size-garbage: disk space consumed by garbage files, in KiB (unless -H is specified)
Print sizes in human readable format
